text.div:
PatientPostalCodeSearchParameter

Parameter address-postalcode:string

Searches based on the patient's recorded postal code of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-postalcode={postalCode}

ResourcePatient
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPatient
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: PatientPostalCodeSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the patient's recorded postal code of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?address-postalcode={postalCode}
